Case# MPMoviePlaybackState.paused

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case paused
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlaybackState/paused#Discussion)

Playback is currently paused. Playback will resume from the point where it was paused.
